title: Is there a history book that goes from ancient times to modern times? - Quora

response.answer_text: its not east to write about everything happened everywhere for 6000 years but Will Durant and his wife did a great job in their eleven-volume set of books “The Story of Civilization” The Story of Civilization - Wikipedia but the series ends with The Age of Napoleon because the Durants both died – she in her 80s and he in his 90s – before they could complete additional volumes.
The Columbia History of the World is such a book. The Columbia history of the world: John Arthur Garraty, Peter Gay: Amazon.com: Books
